code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const fetchAllPeople=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/people');return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('获取人物列表失败:',error);throw error;}};export const searchPeople=async query=>{try{const response=await api.get("/people/search",{params:{q:query}});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('搜索人物失败:',error);throw error;}};export const fetchPersonById=async id=>{try{const response=await api.get("/people/".concat(id));return response.data;}catch(error){console.error("\u83B7\u53D6\u4EBA\u7269(ID: ".concat(id,")\u8BE6\u60C5\u5931\u8D25:"),error);throw error;}};export const fetchEventsByYear=async year=>{try{const response=await api.get("/events/year/".concat(year));return response.data;}catch(error){console.error("\u83B7\u53D6".concat(year,"\u5E74\u4E8B\u4EF6\u5931\u8D25:"),error);throw error;}};export const fetchEventsByAge=async age=>{try{const response=await api.get("/events/age/".concat(age));return response.data;}catch(error){console.error("\u83B7\u53D6".concat(age,"\u5C81\u4E8B\u4EF6\u5931\u8D25:"),error);throw error;}};
